title: EdTECH
description: I built an EdTech project using React for the frontend, Tailwind CSS for styling, and Firebase for the backend. Key features include user authentication, payment-integration with PayPal and card payments, coupon management, and analytics with Firebase.

title: ACONEWS
description: I developed the Acowale News project using React, Tailwind CSS, and TypeScript for the frontend, with a Node.js and Express backend to fetch and display news from an API.

title: LMS- Ongoing
description: Learning Management System (LMS) using Next.js - frontend, Express -backend, MongoDB -database, and Redis -caching, payment integration, course access management, and an admin dashboard.
